notes: Telemetry is emitted only when VS Code telemetry is enabled.
No GitHub access tokens, backend session tokens, chat message plaintext, GitHub user ids/logins, workspace file contents/paths, or backend URL values are collected.

events.name: vscodeChat.ws.connect
events.description: WebSocket connect outcomes, including whether a cached backend session was reused.

fields.recovered: boolean (optional; true if a cached session was rejected and the client re-exchanged once)

events.name: vscodeChat.ws.reconnect_scheduled
events.description: Reconnect scheduling to diagnose disconnect/retry behavior.
